PHRASE.LANG: kName
Billabong Shop Grand Opening Commemoration Bundle (Women)

Billabong Shop Grand Opening Commemoration Bundle (Women)

Billabong Shop Grand Opening Commemoration Bundle (Women)
Billabong Shop Grand Opening Commemoration Bundle (Women)
kDesc

This is a limited-time only special bundle that celebrates the opening of Billabong's store in SCE Asia PlayStation®Home!
 This bundle includes the following items:

 ・Billabong - Lovelorn – Pearl (Women)
 ・Billabong - Lovelorn – Black (Women)
 ・Billabong - Lucy Dress - Red (Women)
 ・Billabong - Farrow Dress - Charcoal (Women)
 ・Billabong - Laelia Dress (Women)
 ・Billabong - Kelly Dress (Women)
 ・Billabong - Leena Dress - Blue (Women)
 ・Billabong - Leena Dress - Grey (Women)

 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories.[#Legal]
